Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer

Class MainPageImageLoader

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.controllers.renderer.MainPageImageLoader
public class MainPageImageLoader extends Object
The helper of the MainController to facilitate the rendering process of the main page.
Realizes Single Responsibility Principle and FACADE Design Pattern.
Author:
fy916

  • Method Details

    • renderMainPage

      public static void renderMainPage​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imagebackground, javafx.scene.image.ImageView tittle, javafx.scene.image.ImageView button1, javafx.scene.image.ImageView button2, javafx.scene.image.ImageView button3, javafx.scene.image.ImageView button4, javafx.scene.image.ImageView button5, int choice, int focus)
      Render the background of the main page of the game
      Parameters:
      imagebackground - The background image placeholder to be rendered
      tittle - The Bubble Bobble LOGO placeholder
      button1 - ImageView placeholder is used to load images and serve as a Start game button
      button2 - ImageView placeholder is used to load images and serve as a Quit game button
      button3 - ImageView placeholder is used to load images and serve as an Info page button
      button4 - ImageView placeholder is used to load images and serve as a Leader board button
      button5 - ImageView placeholder is used to load images and serve as a Settings button
      choice - The user choice
      focus - The user's focus on the button

    • zoomButton

      public static void zoomButton​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, boolean ifzoom)
      Choose if to zoom in the ImageView
      Parameters:
      imageView - The placeholder of the Image that serves as a button
      ifzoom - If to enlarge the button
